item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1805; 11:43PM; 233 S Av 52; MAP: https://bit.ly/3w417Ft; Highland Park; Firefighters found a one-story single-family home with heavy fire, and structures being threatened on three sides. Firefighters began a defensive attack (from the exterior only) and successfully defended all three adjacent structures. It took 30 firefighters 40 minutes to extinguish the flames. Sadly, one person was found inside and perished in the blaze. Age/gender/affiliation/circumstances unknown. Fire investigators, LAPD, and Coroner notified. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AR1 BC2 E1 E12 E201 E212 E250 E44 RA12 RA844 T1 T12 T50; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1805; 11:03PM; 213 S Av 52; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KJfrHz; Highland Park; One-story single family home with heavy fire showing, and nearby structures threatened. KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1156; 04:23PM; 1301 S Soto St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3w6HD2Y; Boyle Heights; It took 50 firefighters 25 minutes to extinguish flames in the vacant (boarded up) structure and attic space, using interior fire attack with coordinated rooftop ventilation. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E14 E17 E2 E20 E203 E210 E211 E25 E60 EA1 RA17 RA25 T10 T11 T3; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0692; 11:44AM; 11555 W Kittridge St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tOYF2Q; North Hollywood; *Corrected Address* Firefighters found a detached garage on fire to the rear of the property. The flames spread to a nearby detached structure (appeared to be an ADU). Firefighters defended other nearby structures while extinguishing the two small detached units, which took 28 firefighters 17 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; AR1 BC14 E102 E239 E260 E289 E39 E77 E89 RA77 RA89 T39 T60 T89; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Offensive mode.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E239 E260 E289 E39 E77 E89 RA77 RA89 T39 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update Major Emergency Brush Fire CONTAINED - #HansenFire 03/13/2022 INC#1459

item.description: Update CONTAINED - #HansenFire Major Emergency Brush Fire; INC#1459; 11:12PM; 10400 N Glenoaks Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3q1x65g; Hansen Dam; Despite light-to-moderate winds, a well coordinated air attack combined with a relentless ground-based offense with firefighting handlines and hand tools by 124 LAFD personnel, assisted by two LACoFD Hand Crews, has fully contained the Hansen Fire fire to a total of 4 acres of brush, in just 1 hour and 39 minutes. There are no injuries, no structures damaged. Firefighters will continue to work the fire's perimeter with hoselines, hand tools and heavy equipment through the night to extinguish any hot spots. The fire's specific cause is under investigation. ; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC15 BP74 BP8 CE59 CM42 E103 E105 E108 E18 E239 E24 E274 E275 E287 E289 E290 E39 E61 E7 E70 E77 E89 E90 E91 E93 E97 EM15 H1 H2 H3 H5 HA1 HA2 HA3 HA5 RA7 RA77 RA828 RA83 RT83 T39 T74 T75 T87 T89 T90 WT77 WT88 + LACoFD BC4 SUP19 SUP21 C14-2 C19-2; CH5; 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Major Emergency Brush Fire #HansenFire 03/13/2022 INC#1459

item.description: Update #HansenFire Major Emergency Brush Fire; INC#1459; 10:55PM; 10400 N Glenoaks Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3q1x65g; Hansen Dam; With 124 LAFD ground and air responders now joined by two LACoFD Hand Crews / Supervisors and one LACoFD Battalion Chief in Automatic Aid, this active wildfire known as the Hansen Fire, has escalated to Major Emergency status. The flames, still driven by 10 MPH wind, have consumed brush on two fronts, including 3 acres to the north side, and one-quarter (0.25) acre to the south near *but not involving* the golf course. There are NO injuries reported, NO structures currently threatened and NO formal evacuations.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC15 BP74 BP8 CM42 E103 E105 E108 E18 E239 E24 E274 E275 E287 E289 E290 E39 E61 E7 E70 E77 E89 E90 E91 E93 E97 EM15 H1 H2 H3 H5 HA1 HA2 HA3 HA5 RA7 RA77 RA828 T39 T74 T75 T87 T89 T90 WT77 WT88 + LACoFD BC4 SUP19 SUP21 C14-2 C19-2; CH5; 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Brush Fire #HansenFire 03/13/2022 INC#1459

item.description: Update #HansenFire Greater Alarm Brush Fire; INC#1459; 10:10PM; 10400 N Glenoaks Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3q1x65g; #HansenDam; With 95 LAFD ground and air responders joined by two LACoFD Hand Crews / Supervisors, this active wildfire incident has escalated to Greater Alarm status, and is formally known as the #HansenFire. No acreage update. There are NO injuries reported, NO structures currently threatened and NO formal evacuations.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC15 CM42 E103 E108 E18 E24 E274 E275 E287 E289 E39 E7 E70 E77 E89 E90 E97 EM15 H1 H2 H3 H5 HA1 HA2 HA3 HA5 RA7 RA77 T74 T75 T87 T89 WT77 WT88; CH5; 18; Brian Humphrey
